dept_info.work_info:
Primary Health Centers (PHCs) will be made eligible for emergency care to prevent maternal and newborn death.
Asha and Anganwadi workers will be recognized as government employees and will be regularized.
Urban primary health centers will be opened at a population of every 30,000, Usha workers will be appointed in each center and Mohalla clinics will be established in urban settlements.

survey_score.question: How satisfied are you with the government's efforts in the field of health?

dept_info.work_info:
As per the recommendations of CSS Commission, 60,000 additional schools in Bihar (26,000 primary schools, 15,500 middle schools and 19,000 Higher Secondary Schools)
Teacher-student ratio will be reduced to 1:30 in primary schools and 1:35 in middle schools.
All teachers will be regularly ensured by equal pay, job safety and quality training for equal work.

survey_score.question: How satisfied are you with the government's efforts in the field of education?

To set up a purchase center at every panchayat level.

All pending government vacancies will be filled without delay.
By improving MNREGA, every person will ensure 200 days of employment on minimum wages instead of family.
By bringing the Urban Employment Guarantee Act, 300 days work will be made available to each adult on livelihood wages.
